TopicTitle: not getting any science upon recovering

Articles.Content:
hello,

so I went to the tundra and did the usual science.

observe goo

study material bay

crew report

etc...

then I hit "recover vessel" to collect the stored science points.

but it didn't collect the points. when I look in science achevements I see all the things I have just "discovered" but not ANY science value in the bar behind it.

PLEASE HALP MEH.

build id = 00705

2014-12-15_13-42-05

Branch: master

Edited December 27, 2014 by superrroy

One thing to know is that you may have already gathered data from the Tundra. Even if you haven't gone all the way up there, it's possible because of a small biome glitch near KSC. There's actually a small patch of Tundra west of KSC that's easy to "accidentally" land in and not even know it. But it will still show up in your science archives. Try digging around a little in there and see if it's already logged.

Also, if you were on EVA and you hit "Recover Vessel," it'll only recover your guy. You have to go back to the tracking center to find the ship and recover it separately.

Cheers,

~Claw

the 1 one is not possible

the second one I know of

here is a screen with the "discoverys" getting stored and not getting any science value( I used the goo as an example)

(I got the full bars by transmitting the data)

as you can see I observed the goo but after recovering I didnt get any science.

Edited December 27, 2014 by Master Tao
[IMG] tags
can some1 please help me with this? I can't do anything with this game now. I paid money for this.

Hi again superroy,

It does look like you found a bug there. I haven't had the chance to try it out and see what's causing it. I'll see if I can check this out today, but you should be able to continue collecting science in other biomes.

As an added note, KSP is still in development. Unfortunately that means there are quite a few bugs. Some are fairly minor while others are pretty painful when you find them. We'll do our best to help you along, but we are players, just like you.

Cheers,

-Claw

Same problem. KSS Beta, Steam, No Mods. I can get recovery report in the new game. But in old saved game from previews versions there is no recovery report at all. Just "base overview" after Recovery.
